author: ate
msg: First version of Fusion synchronized with J2-M2-dev.
Tested on Tomcat 5.0.28, 5.0.30 and 5.5.8, all working (maybe not 100%, but it certainly looks good)
JSR-168 Portlet Browser applications are removed but instead you can deploy the new J2 palm portlet!

author: sgala
msg: Changed ISO-8859-1 characters in source code to \uNNNN, to avoid building problems in UTF-8 (or other encodings) file systems:
